project.name: C-C824B-PSQL-10-ST03-DT02-DF12-CF02-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C824B-PSQL-10-ST03-DT02-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Malloc a function pointer. If the input length is not equal to 10, set the function pointer to a function. Try to use the function pointer. This will seg fault if the input length is exactly 10.

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C824B-PSQL-10-ST03-DT02-DF12-CF02-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Malloc a function pointer. If the input length is not equal to 10, set the function pointer to a function. Try to use the function pointer. This will seg fault if the input length is exactly 10.

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="12345 Hello world!" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-03 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
